column4: Any LG customers? You might want to follow/vote/tweet/like/etc. this: http://support.lgforum.com/lg/topics/ubuntu_for_android
I'm not an LG customer, but I'll become one perhaps if they do this!
You would be better off in the forums anyways.
You're probably right! It's a bit fast-paced in here these days to say the least. Pretty much just a continuous flood.
